channel.title: Go Humble! RSS BOOKS
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle books bundles!

item.title: So You Wanna Try Out Pathfinder by Paizo
item.description: Gear up for your Pathfinder journey
item.content:encoded:
Limitless adventure awaits—and this epic bundle from Paizo is the perfect way to join the thriving community of rangers, rogues, and sorcerers in the Pathfinder 2nd Edition tabletop role-playing game! This digital adventurer’s kit is packed with everything new heroes need to embark on their own saga, plus tons of RPG resources to power countless adventures to come:
  • Outfit yourself with essentials including the digital Pathfinder 2E Beginner Box and Core Rulebook.
  • Discover the perils that await in the Abomination Vaults Adventure Path (plus Foundry Virtual Tabletop version) and more campaign ebooks.
  • Get resources to enhance your journey, including guides to the Pathfinder world, expanded character options, digital pawns & maps, and more.
Unleash your hero…and help support Code for America with your purchase!

item.title: Encore Fallout RPG & 3D Miniatures by Modiphius
item.description: Tabletop warfare and role-playing in the wasteland
item.content:encoded: Journey into the Vaults, ruined cities, and radioactive wastes of Fallout: Wasteland Warfare with this bundle of tabletop combat & role-playing books and resources from Modiphius! Prepare for life and death in the post-apocalypse with a digital pack full of rulebooks, RPG expansions, campaign handbooks, and more ebooks. Bring your adventures and battles to life with 3D printable (STL format) terrain and miniatures. Explore the Fallout on your tabletop, and help support Trees, Water, People; and the charity of your choice.

item.title: Applied Engineering by Mercury
item.description: Put engineering concepts & theory into practice
item.content:encoded: Find practical answers to real problems with this engineers’ library from Mercury Learning! This bundle of ebooks explores the concepts that modern mechanical, industrial, and electrical engineers need in their everyday work, including data science, physics, mathematics tools, IoT, and much more. Learn critical concepts, discover how to apply them in your own career, and help support NPower and Whale & Dolphin Conservation with your purchase!

item.title: 2000 AD Character Spotlight by Rebellion
item.description: Judge Dredd, Slaine, Nikolai Dante, and more
item.content:encoded: The Galaxy's Greatest Comics are back! The famed British science-fiction magazine 2000 AD has been entertaining readers for years, and given the world some of comics’ most beloved and celebrated authors and artists. This thrilling bundle highlights some of 2000 AD’s most iconic characters with books like Judge Dredd Day of Chaos: Endgame, Slaine: The Horned God, and Nikolai Dante: Sympathy for the Devil—among dozens of others. Explore some of Britain’s most popular comic book characters, and help support Cancer Research UK!

item.title: Unreal Game Development by Packt
item.description: Learn 3D game development with Unreal Engine 5
item.content:encoded:
Unreal Engine 5 is the industry-leading 3D game design software that the professionals use to create today’s top games. This carefully crafted bundle contains video courses and books that will guide you through building your first video game, creating incredible 3D environments, and a survival horror game. Start your journey towards getting paid to make video games today.

Your purchase of this bundle will help support Save the Children, working to provide life-saving assistance and long-term relief in response to the Türkiye and Syria earthquake.

item.title: True Crime Essentials by Skyhorse Publishing
item.description: A cold-blooded collection of true-life tales
item.content:encoded: From Skyhorse Publishing comes this expansive collection of books covering true crimes—grisly murders tied to key political figures, cults hidden in plain sight in New York City, family betrayal, and much more. Explore the nature of evil and the insidious ways people respond when pushed to their limits in this macabre library, and discover whether justice is swift (or delivered at all) in detailed, award-winning books like Mary’s Mosaic, Double Cross, and dozens more. Plus, your purchase goes on to support the NAACP Legal Defense Fund.
